title: How to Cook Barley and Vegetable Soup

steps.headline: Pour the olive oil, onion, carrot, beans, mushrooms, red pepper and celery to the saucepan.
Cook over medium heat for ten minutes.
steps.description: Only soften the vegetables; do not let them go brown.

steps.headline: Add the barley, thyme and bay leaves.
Bring to the boil.
steps.description: Turn down the heat and allow to simmer for one hour until the barley is tender.

steps.headline: Season with salt and pepper to taste.

text: Pour the olive oil, onion, carrot, beans, mushrooms, red pepper and celery to the saucepan.  Cook over medium heat for ten minutes. Only soften the vegetables; do not let them go brown. Add the barley, thyme and bay leaves. Cover generously with cold water. Bring to the boil. Turn down the heat and allow to simmer for one hour until the barley is tender. Remove the bay leaves.  Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve. Finished.
